name: Typer (Nimble Tools)
description:
Get fast at typing. Type texts real fast and get the best times.

Includes local and online leaderboards!

Also lets you play custom text files. Simply put your own txt files in the text folder and start playing.

I originally made this game in 2016, but didn't release it until 2018. Also, there's no guarantee I'll keep the online leaderboards online.
